### Introduction
This shiny app demonstrates the growth of Orange trees.

### Features of shiny app
* Select Shiny widget Radio buttons for selecting the type of graph. (scatter or line)

* Select the area on the plot, and you'll see the output section in sidebar panel will display the data for the selected region on the plot.


#### Note : Output section won't display any data until area is not selected on the plot.
